job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Title : Site Reliability Engineer<br>Location : Seattle WA ( Remote )<br>Position type : Full time<br><br>Title : Site Reliability Engineer.<br>Position type : Full time<br>Location : Seattle WA<br><br>Job description<br><br>Summary of Experience:<br> <br>- Coding and Operations experience (5+ years combined)<br>- Designing, supporting and deploying all types of applications and tools (2+ years)<br>- Support of CI\CD Dev Tooling (2+ years)<br>- Operating complex, large-scale Enterprise applications or web sites (4+ years)<br>- Experience working in an environment that implemented Agile (2+ years)<br>- Ecommerce experience (2+ years)<br> <br>Required Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:<br> <br>- Continuous delivery tooling <br>- Cloud Experience, preferably with AWS & Terraform<br>- Security experience: Akamai CDN & Bot Manager<br>- Keen understanding of branching, versioning and release strategies<br>- Scripting languages, such as Python, Bash, Perl<br>- Infrastructure as code: Terraform<br>- Hands on experience with Jenkins and artifact repository (Nexus) administration<br>- Experience with automating software tests in a pipeline<br>- Proven experience with ELK stack, New Relic, Netdata, Graphite, Grafana <br>- Commercial retail website architecture.<br>
